sentences.english: Results All the gastroscopies were performed successfully under general anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 結果全部胃鏡檢查均在麻醉下順利完成。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effects of nursing intervention during gastroscopic examination.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討護理干預措施在胃鏡檢查中的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the small dose of fentanyl used in the clinical effect of painless gastroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察小劑量芬太尼用於無痛胃鏡檢查的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of whole course nursing intervention for patients with electronic gastroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討全程護理干預在電子胃鏡檢查中的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of endoscopic methylene blue staining in the diagnosis of gastric precancerous lesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胃鏡下亞甲藍染色對胃癌前病變的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion Bilpsy under a gastroscope, especially under ultrasonic gastroscopy had great diagnostic values.
sentences.chinese: 結論胃鏡活檢特別是超聲胃鏡下活檢最有診斷價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion Bilpsy under a gastroscope, especially under ultrasonic gastroscopy had great diagnostic values.
sentences.chinese: 結論胃鏡活檢特別是超聲胃鏡下活檢最有診斷價值。

sentences.english: Gastric fundus disease was diagnosed by method of U-type reverse gastroscope biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 採用前視型胃鏡，利用U型反轉法活檢胃底病變。

sentences.english: Mucosal biopsy by gastroscopy showed low differentiated adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 胃鏡下胃黏膜活檢示低分化腺癌。

sentences.english: Gastrointestinal tract and gastroscope inspection fee for the main diagnostic methods.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸道造影和胃鏡檢查爲主要的診斷方法。

sentences.english: Presently you must hospitalize where the doctor can therapy you, for example, they wil take you endoscopy examination.
sentences.chinese: 目前，你必須住院接受治療，並進行胃鏡檢查。

sentences.english: The endoscope does not interfere with your breathing.
sentences.chinese: 放入的胃鏡不會干擾你的呼吸。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of gastroscopy examination on children with chronic abdominal pain.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒慢性腹痛胃鏡檢查的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: The finding ratio of this chronic disease is getting higher with the help of fiber gastroscope.
sentences.chinese: 在纖維胃鏡廣泛應用中檢出率日益增多。

sentences.english: Method To inject reptilase into periphery of bleeding ulcer by electronic gastroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 方法電子胃鏡下對出血病竈周邊注射立止血。

sentences.english: Objective to observe the disinfection effect of gastroscope by ozone water.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察臭氧水在胃鏡體的消毒效果監測。

definition: to give or have an acupuncture treatment
biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
